text:
One word: FINALLY!!! finally a Salvadoran restaurant that provides great food from that Central American country in a clean AND not shameful setting!! Food... real Salvadoran food, pupusas al dente, chicarron amazing, Platano frito to die for, orchata... goes without saying!! Family ran, with lots of TLC. Well priced (pupusas a little expensive) but worth de détour. When you feel welcome only makes it easier to say... vamos again and again!!!!
PS: why not Order a sangria when visiting? Summer is around the corner, right???
Rica comida!!!! Camarones del plató mar y tierra deliciosos!!!! Finalmente un restaurante salvadoreño moderno
Belle endroit le personnel est très serviable et aimable. Les prix son bien et la nourriture est bien. Le.menu est varié il font même des tacos même si c'est salvadorien.
